scripts.pretest: ../../scripts/link_deps.sh && bazel run @nodejs//:yarn && webdriver-manager update --standalone false --gecko false $CHROMEDRIVER_VERSION_ARG
scripts.e2e-devserver: concurrently "bazel run //:devserver" "while ! nc -z 127.0.0.1 8080; do sleep 1; done && protractor" --kill-others --success first
scripts.e2e-prodserver: concurrently "bazel run //:prodserver" "while ! nc -z 127.0.0.1 8080; do sleep 1; done && protractor" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test: bazel build ... && yarn e2e-devserver && yarn e2e-prodserver
